Text:
NOW this must be GOOD with TWISTED in the name..
thanks,.. nice job,.. well done,.. ; )

Alright, so I was able to install the game without any problems.  The main menu opens without a problem, but when I click on Single Player, a box comes up telling me that the CD isn't in.  Clicking retry does nothing, cancel or X brings me back to the menu.  Is there something I did wrong, or a step I forgot?  Burning it to a CD is not an option for me.
